name: alexa-suggest-movie
description: The Alexa Skills that will suggest movies based on your mood

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ 2> /dev/null && mkdir dist && zip -9 -r dist/alexa-suggest-movie.zip package.json node_modules/ && cd src && zip -9 -r ../dist/alexa-suggest-movie.zip * && cd ..

author: DiUS Computing PTY
